node.node: Care for a delectable treat?
I knew you'd be back.
Ah... back for more, I see.
Great~! Here, take a look.
You'll be back...
Your highness... it's really you. I can't believe you're alive. My name's Levi, by the way.
I pulled you out of that scraped heap of burning metal, just outside town. I was afraid you weren't going to make it.
You had this with you. I held onto it for safe keeping. Does it look familiar?
You got a Knife!
I hope you remember how to use it. (Stick 'em with the pointy end.) That engraving proves that you are the true heir.
When the urchin appeared from below, 1000 years ago, the king sealed off the castle.
Their paramount concern is to shelter themselves from the urchin below. They let us live as a mere buffer to the horde.
No one has seen the king and queen since then, but rumors suggest they're still alive after all this time.
The only escape from this damned place is through the castle, to the north. If we are to survive, you must find a way through.
Head north to the castle. I will meet you again there.

event.node: I can equip parts to your gear for you.

node.text: Whatta ya say? Upgrade your gear?

node.node: Come back soon!
Let me know if you change your mind.
Oh! You're finally up.
Levi brought you in here. He's outside and up the hill.
You were all beat up and bloodied. You should really go and thank him.
Anyway... you don't have any money on you, so get out of here.

event.node: Young Adventurer's Survival Guide Serial, Issue 131.

node.text: Young Adventurer's Survival Guide Serial, Issue 131. Read it?

node.node: Hold SPACEBAR to use your suit's boost function and SHIFT to use the reverse boost function.
Propelling you forth with a focused burst of ether, the boost function will allow you to cross chasms, and dodge enemy attacks.
At the start of a boost you will absorb most enemy attacks. This Perfect Dodge will redirect that energy into your HP and EP.
Boosting will consume your energy. If depleted, your boost will be cut off, so be careful not to use it for too long!
I have nothing to say to outsiders.
That knife...
Is it really you, your highness?

node.text: Is it really you, your highness?

node.node: Hmph, such blasphemy... be gone with you.
Your highness! You have been gone far too long! Please ask me if you're curious about anything!
I have nothing to say to outsiders.
Your highness, a lot has changed in the millennium since you fled the capitol. Ask me anything!

node.text: What would you like to know about?

node.node: The Pizza phenomenon has taken the kingdom by storm.
First offered in its traditional food disk form, many locals have put their own spin on the formula.
The Royal Knights are no friends to us commoners. They know of your arrival, and they will be hunting for you.
They ceased to exist as humans ever since the castle was sealed.
If you have to fight them, never attack head on.
As we speak, the land sinks deeper into this sea of primordial ether.
In a few days time, the last traces of our great nation will desolve into the sea.
The monsters from below have risen to the surface to claim our remains.

event.node: You look like you could use a weapon.
You've finally made it here, child. Your journey is complete.
I was once the proud ruler of this land. I thought I could save its people.
With unlimited time, power and will, I believed that I could halt this plague of urchins.
I built great machines. Steel behemoths that could neutralize the plague.
As punishment for my arrogance, the world was flooded in ether.
My friends have lost their form, degenerating into monstrosities.
Please... I ask of you only one final task. Plunge your blade into my unbeating heart.

node.text: Will you grant your king this last request?

event.node: Without regard to your intention, your fingers move with a will of their own.
Unable to control your actions, you draw your knife and strike.
As your blade sinks into the king's cold flesh, you feel your mind slipping.
You did a good job. Thank you for playing.
